actions.name: Send Out
actions.description:
Trigger: A new combat begins.
Effect: You may use this Action once as a Free Action, gaining [Interrupt 4] for this use of the Action.
Targeting a creature whom the user is responsible for that is currently not in combat, the user may, using the method of their choosing, bring that creature into the combat.
Most commonly, this is used with releasing creatures stored in Balls, who may be sent out within 5m from the user, or 2m from a spot that the user Flings the Ball at.
